Article Title: Why Microsoft has asked employees in China to stop using Android phones and only use iPhones at office
Article Text:
Only iPhones, no Android phones at work



Recent security incidents are behind this change

Microsoft is set to implement a significant cybersecurity measure in China, requiring all employees to use iPhones for work-related tasks and discontinuing the use of Android devices, according to an internal memo reviewed by Bloomberg News.Starting September, the tech giant will restrict corporate access from Android-powered devices in China, affecting hundreds of workers across the mainland.This decision is part of Microsoft's global Secure Future Initiative (SFI), aimed at standardising employee cybersecurity practices.The memo, as reported by Bloomberg, states that Chinese-based employees will soon be required to use only Apple devices for identity verification when logging into work computers or phones. This mandate highlights the growing divergence between Chinese and foreign mobile ecosystems, particularly in the fragmented landscape of Android app stores in China.Unlike Apple's iOS store, Google Play is not available in China, leading local smartphone makers like Huawei and Xiaomi to operate their own platforms. Microsoft's decision to block access from these devices stems from their lack of Google's mobile services in the country, according to the internal message.To make this transition easier, Microsoft will provide iPhone 15 devices as a one-time purchase to staff currently using Android handsets. The company plans to make these iPhones available for collection at various hubs across China, including Hong Kong, where Google's services are accessible.This move comes in the wake of increasing security concerns for Microsoft. Bloomberg reports that the company has faced repeated attacks from state-sponsored hackers, including a Russia-linked breach disclosed in January that affected dozens of US government agencies.In response to these challenges, Microsoft has pledged its most ambitious security overhaul in two decades through the SFI. Executive Vice President Charlie Bell emphasised in May that security has become the company's top priority, surpassing all other features.While Microsoft has not publicly addressed this specific policy change in China, it aligns with the company's broader efforts to enhance cybersecurity globally. These efforts include faster addressing of cloud vulnerabilities, strengthening credential protection, and enforcing multi factor authentication for employees.
Article Summary: Microsoft is set to implement a significant cybersecurity measure in China, requiring all employees to use iPhones for work-related tasks. The tech giant will restrict corporate access from Android-powered devices in China. This decision is part of Microsoft's global Secure Future Initiative, aimed at standardising employee cybersecurity practices.

Article Title: Zepto CEO: If you want to build a business bigger than Flipkart and Amazon, than this is the business
Article Text:
Building business bigger than Flipkart and Amazon

Aadit Palicha, co-founder and CEO of Zepto, a quick commerce platform in India, said that the company sees itself as a " hyperlocal Walmart of India," according to a report in The Economic Times. Palicha believes that Zepto can realistically reach a topline of Rs 2.5 lakh crore in five years, focusing on the top 40 cities in the country."We think of ourselves as a hyperlocal Walmart for a hyperlocal India...That was the big gap that helped us get to the scale and the level of profitability we've gotten to," Palicha said at an event in New Delhi, as reported by The Economic Times.While Zepto and competitors like Blinkit and Swiggy Instamart are expanding into categories like electronics and fashion, Palicha believes that groceries and household essentials hold the biggest opportunity. "If you want to build a business that's larger than Amazon or Flipkart...grocery is bigger than all the categories that Amazon and Flipkart serve combined," he said. ‚ÄúIf you take electronics, apparel, furniture and all the others ‚Äì and double it, it‚Äôs still not as large as grocery and household essentials. So, we‚Äôre building in the mother of all categories,‚Äù he added.The grocery and household essentials segment in India is estimated at $650 billion and is projected to grow to $850 billion by FY29, according to Palicha. Zepto will focus on the top 40 cities, which are expected to make up for nearly half of the market by FY29."Our focus is not really on the next 100 cities," Palicha said. "From our perspective, if we execute well, we can realistically take this business from over Rs 10,000 crore in topline (gross merchandise value) today to Rs 2.5 lakh crore in topline over the next five years in the top 40 cities."Zepto reportedly became the fastest company to reach $1 billion in GMV and maintains a growth rate exceeding 100% year-on-year. The company also aims to double its dark stores or micro-warehouses to 700 to compete with rivals like Blinkit, Instamart, and Tata Group 's BB Now.This comes after Zepto closed a $665 million funding round in June, valuing the company at $3.6 billion. "In commerce generally, nobody has been able to build a hyperlocal platform at scale that has quality customer experience...and the reality is that most (of the) commerce in India is done on a hyperlocal basis," Palicha said according to The Economic Times.
Article Summary: Aadit Palicha, co-founder and CEO of Zepto, a quick commerce platform in India, said that the company sees itself as a " hyperlocal Walmart of India" He believes the company can realistically reach a topline of Rs 2.5 lakh crore in five years, focusing on the top 40 cities.

Article Title: Google Maps test new feature to promote sponsored businesses
Article Text:
How Google is showing these sponsored stops



Google Maps has started a new test that will suggest sponsored stops to drivers. A user named Anthony Higman took to social media platform X (earlier Twitter) to reveal the existence of the feature and shared how it works. The X post (first seen by PhoneArena) claims that the Google Maps app may now suggest pitstops at businesses that pay to advertise on the app, even if they aren't on the driver‚Äôs route.Higman reported being directed to Royal Farms with a low rating of 2.9.Another user named Mike Blumenthal also commented on the post showing how Google Maps misdirected him with a sponsored pitstop.As per the report, these pop-up ads seem to be completely random, unlike most online ads that consider the user‚Äôs search history. It's like having random billboards shoved in the face while you're trying to focus on the road.Apart from this, the pop-ups may also turn out to be dangerous. They appear while driving and require interaction (tapping "Cancel" or "Add stop") which can distract the driver from the road, especially if they are relying on audio navigation. These pop-ads can be highly distractive, especially to new and inexperienced drivers.The report also claims that Google may have lifted this idea from its subsidiary Waze , which is allegedly only supposed to show sponsored suggestions when your vehicle is not moving. However, some users have reported that it‚Äôs not the case.The report didn‚Äôt reveal whether this feature is in testing or will be made available for all users soon. One of the X users who reported the problem has also declared that he will stop using the app if he gets sponsored suggestions every time he is driving.Meanwhile, another X user mentioned that it could be a good way to discover new places to go to.
Article Summary: A user named Anthony Higman took to social media platform X (earlier Twitter) to reveal the existence of the feature and shared how it works. The X post claims that the Google Maps app may now suggest pitstops at businesses that pay to advertise on the app, even if they aren't on the driver's route. These pop-up ads seem to be completely random, unlike most online ads that consider the user‚Äôs search history.

Article Title: Chinese researchers develop AI-powered robot with ‚Äòartificial‚Äô brain
Article Text:
What researchers said about the technology



What are brain organoids



Scientists in China have made a significant breakthrough in artificial intelligence (AI) by reportedly creating a robot which is powered by a lab-grown, artificial brain . This brain-on-chip technology reportedly utilises human stem cells to develop a simplified brain-like structure that controls the robot.According to a report by the South China Morning Post, researchers were successfully able to program the robot to perform basic tasks such as avoiding obstacles and grasping objects using a neural interface chip .This innovation represents a significant leap forward in brain-computer interfaces ( BCI ), a field aiming to merge brain activity with external computing power.BCI has become a trending topic, with companies like Elon Musk's Neuralink introducing implantable chips for controlling devices with the mind.Researchers at Tianjin University said that it is ‚Äúthe world‚Äôs first open-source brain-on-chip intelligent complex information interaction system‚Äù and may lead to the development of brain-like computing.In a statement to the state-owned Science and Technology Daily, the vice president of Tianjin University, Ming Dong said: ‚Äú[This] is a technology that uses an in-vitro cultured ‚Äòbrain‚Äô ‚Äì such as brain organoids‚Äì coupled with an electrode chip to form a brain-on-chip,‚Äù which encodes and decodes stimulation feedback.The research at Tianjin University holds promise for the creation of a new era of hybrid human-robot intelligence .Brain organoids are tiny clumps of brain-like tissue. They're made from special cells that can turn into many different types of cells. These cells are usually only found in very young embryos.These scientists have put these brain organoids into real brains. They found that the organoids could connect and work with the real brain tissue.The scientists wrote about this in an unedited manuscript published in the peer-reviewed Oxford University Press journal Brain last month.‚ÄúThe transplant of human brain organoids into living brains is a novel method for advancing organoid development and function. Organoid grafts have a host-derived functional vasculature system and exhibit advanced maturation,‚Äù the team wrote.
Article Summary: Researchers at Tianjin University have created a robot powered by a brain-on- chip. Brain organoids are tiny clumps of brain-like tissue. They're made from special cells that can turn into many different types of cells. These cells are usually only found in very young embryos. Scientists have put these brain organoids into real brains. They found that the organoids could connect and work with the real brain tissue.

Article Title: LG UltraGear OLED gaming monitors launched in India: Price, features and more
Article Text:
LG UltraGear OLED gaming monitor price

LG UltraGear OLED gaming monitor features

27GS95QE-B.ATR: 27-inch OLED QHD monitor with fast response times and a 240Hz refresh rate and 0.03ms response time.

34GS95QE-B.ATR: 34-inche OLED WQHD display with 800R curved design.

39GS95QE-B.ATR: Expansive 21:9 Ultra-WQHD OLED display with an instinctual curve for an optimal gaming experience.

45GS95QE-B.ATR: The largest in the group at 45 inches, the monitor has 21:9 Ultra-WQHD display coupled with HDR True Black 400 standards and 800R curve design.

LG has launched the LG UltraGear OLED series in four sizes ‚Äì 27-inch, 34-inch, 39-inch and 45-inch ‚Äì in India with features tailored for gamers. The company said that the gaming monitors offer OLED technology enhanced with Micro Lens Array Plus (MLA+) to deliver brighter visuals and deeper blacks, ensuring HDR True Black 400 and 1.5M:1 contrast ratio.The UltraGear OLED series models are available for purchase at a price starting from Rs 1,20,000.Those interested can get their hands on the monitors from LG.com, Amazon and Flipkart.The LG UltraGear monitors feature an 800R curvature, optimised for a viewing distance of 800mm ‚Äì for long gaming sessions. The display offers response times of 0.03ms and a refresh rate of up to 240Hz for smooth motion and reduced eye strain. They feature sRGB 95% and DCI-P3 98.5% colour gamut. An anti-glare OLED coating helps safer viewing over extended periods.The monitor is Nvidia G-SYNC Compatible and AMD FreeSync Premium Pro, minimising tearing and stuttering for faster and smoother gaming experiences. While ClearMR 13,000 certification delivers 125-135 times more clear pixels, reducing motion blur in gaming, G-Sync synchronises the monitor panel's refresh rate with the GPU frame rate to eliminate tearing and minimise input lag.
Article Summary: LG has launched the LG UltraGear OLED series in four sizes ‚Äì 27-inch, 34-inches, 39-inch and 45-inch ‚Äì in India. The company said that the gaming monitors offer OLED technology enhanced with Micro Lens Array Plus (MLA+) to deliver brighter visuals and deeper blacks.

Article Title: Samsung workers go on 3-day strike in South Korea: This is what they are demanding
Article Text:
Why union workers are protesting against Samsung

Union on alleged low turnout in strike

Samsung workers on Monday (July 8) have begun a three-day strike in South Korea , with the union alleging that the country‚Äôs biggest conglomerate continues to fall short of its demands. The tech company, however, said that there was no disruption in production.The National Samsung Electronics Union (NSEU), which has roughly 30,000 members and make up almost a quarter of the firm's South Korean workforce, has put three demands.The workers have demanded better pay along with an extra day of annual leave for unionised workers as well as changes to the employee bonus system . They allege that bonuses for rank-and-file workers are calculated by deducting the cost of capital from operating profit, whereas those for executives are based on personal performance goals.The union said 6,540 workers will be striking this week, mostly at manufacturing sites and in product development, as per news agency Reuters.In the first industrial action last month, the union coordinated annual leave to stage a mass walkout. As per union officials, nearly 3,000 strikers attended a rally near Samsung's headquarters in Hwaseong, Seoul. Samsung, however, said that it had no impact on business activity.Union president Son Woo-mok disputed media reports of low participation, and told the news agency that the union did not have enough time to educate members about the issues.‚ÄúEducation about labour unions ... has not been enough. But I don't think this participation is low because our union is still young compared to other unions,‚Äù he said. Meanwhile, the union's vice president hinted of more strikes if Samsung does not improve its proposals.He said that Samsung's proposals include flexibility in pay and annual leave conditions but do not meet union demands of increased pay and leave.
Article Summary: National Samsung Electronics Union (NSEU) has roughly 30,000 members and make up almost a quarter of the firm's South Korean workforce. The workers have demanded better pay along with an extra day of annual leave for unionised workers as well as changes to the employee bonus system.

Article Title: Amarnathji Yatra 2024: DoT enhances telecom infrastructure with these 'numbers'
Article Text:
Telecom department increases Site numbers, set up SIM distribution centres

Operator



Sites (Location)







Airtel







19 sites (Soanmarg, Nilgrath Army Camp, Baltal-1, Baltal-2, Domail-1, Domail-2 Army Camp, Rail Patri, Burari, Sangam, Holi Cave, Panchtarni, Poshpatri, Sheshnag, Chandanbari, Nunwan Base Camp, and Multiple Yatri Niwas along the routes) having 2G, 4G & 5G coverage.





BSNL







27 BTSs (Ranga Morh, Baltal, Domail Check Post, Domail, Rail Patri-1 Rail Patri-2, Barari, Y-Junction, Sangam, Holi Cave, Panchtarni, Kelnar-1, Kelnar-2, Posh Patri, Mahagunus Top, Wabal, Sheshnag, Nagakoti, Zojibal-1, Zojibal-2, Pisu Top, Chandanwari, Pahalgam, Nunwan Base Camp, and Multiple Yatri Niwas along the routes) having 2G, 3G and indigenous 4G coverage.





RJIL







36 sites (Gansibal Pahalgam, Nunwan Base Camp, Pahalgam Bus Stand, Pahalgam Market, Lidder Park Pahalgam, Circuit Road Pahalgam, Lalipora Pahalgam, Lalipora ESC, Betab Velly, Chandanwari, Chandanwari Pahalgam, Pisu Top, Zojibal, Sheshnag Camp, Sheshnag Pahalgam, Mahagunas Pass, Poshpatri, Panchtarni-1 Panchtarni-2, Snagam Top, Holi Cave Pahalgam ESC, Holi Cave Pahalgam, BarariMarg, Rail Patri, Domail Camp, Domail, Baltal Base Came-1,2,3,4, Saribal Kangan, Nilgrath Sonamarg, New Truck Yard Sonamarg, Sonamarg Main Market, Sonamarg Road) having 4G, 5G (30 sites on 4G & 5G; 06 sites on 4G) coverage.



The Department of Telecommunications ( DoT ) has announced that it has significantly improved the telecom infrastructure to ensure smooth mobile connectivity for pilgrims participating in the Shri Amarnathji Yatra 2024 . The department said that it has collaborated with major Telecom Service Providers (TSPs) including Reliance Jio, Airtel and BSNL to upgrade the infrastructure to provide continuous coverage along the Yatra routes.According to the announcement by the telecom department, a total of 82 Sites (Airtel, RJIL and BSNL) will be active at key locations to ensure coverage.Additionally, a total of 31 new sites have been installed along the Yatra routes, increasing the total number from 51 in 2023 to 82 in 2024.‚ÄúThis enhancement aims to provide seamless mobile connectivity to the pilgrims and public,‚Äù the DoT said, adding that the routes from Lakhanpur to Qazigund and from Qazigund to Pahalgam and Baltal are fully covered with 2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G technology at many places.Some key points of SIM distribution centres have been opened apart from other locations to extend telecom facilitation. These are: Lakhnapur, Yatri Niwas Bhagwati Nagar, Chanderkot, Anantnag, Srinagar, Srinagar Airport, Pahalgam, Sonamarg and Baltal.TSPs have also installed BTS to ensure continuous coverage of mobile services during Shri Amarnathji Yatra 2024. Here are the details:
Article Summary: The Department of Telecommunications ( DoT ) has significantly improved the telecom infrastructure to ensure smooth mobile connectivity for pilgrims participating in the Shri Amarnathji Yatra 2024. A total of 82 Sites (Airtel, RJIL and BSNL) will be active at key locations to ensure coverage. 31 new sites have been installed along the Yatra routes, increasing the total number from 51 in 2023 to 82 in 2024.

Article Title: Elon Musk responds to Chinese girl who wants him to fix a bug in Tesla screen: Watch
Article Text: A young Tesla owner in China, Molly, has shared a video message directly addressing Tesla CEO Elon Musk about a bug on her car's touchscreen.In a short video posted on X (formerly known as Twitter), Molly highlighted the issue she is facing with the touchscreen in her Tesla car. When she tries to draw on the touchscreen, previously drawn lines disappear as she adds new ones.With wide eyes and a clear explanation, she asks Mr. Musk to "fix an error" on her Tesla.The video quickly went viral on the X platform (formerly known as Twitter), garnering millions of views and capturing the attention of the Tesla CEO himself. Responding to the video, Musk simply replied "Sure," sparking further conversation online.Shared on X (formerly Twitter), the post quickly gained traction, garnering over a million views and 16,000 likes from users. Many users have also reacted to the video.Here are some of the reactions‚Äúthis is a critical issue @elonmusk please fix it‚Äù‚ÄúOh please this is very concerning @elonmusk ! Help her‚Äù‚Äúhalt all production until we resolve. please and thank you.‚Äù‚ÄúAwww, she‚Äôs so adorable‚Äù
Article Summary: A young Tesla owner in China, Molly, shared a video message directly addressing Tesla CEO Elon Musk about a bug on her car's touchscreen. The video quickly went viral on the X platform (formerly known as Twitter), garnering millions of views and capturing the attention of the Tesla CEO himself.

Article Title: Apple MacBook models with M4 chipsets may come with ‚Äòpaid‚Äô AI features
Article Text:
Apple MacBook models with M4 chipset: Expected availability



Apple MacBook Pro models with M4 chipsets: What to expect



Apple is expected to launch new MacBook Pro and MacBook Air models in the coming months. According to a report by Bloomberg‚Äôs Mark Gurman, the rumoured MacBook Pro and MacBook Air machines are likely to come powered by three variants of Apple‚Äôs M4 chipsets -- the base M4, M4 Pro and M4 Max chipsets. The report also notes that the upgraded MacBooks may retain their predecessor's designs and may even offer new features through an AI subscription service which is expected to boost sales.Rumours suggest that Apple will soon release 14-inch and 16-inch models of MacBook Pros with M4 chips by the end of this year or early next year. Moreover, MacBook Air sizes are also in line for an early 2025 refresh.Currently, the only Apple devices with the M4 chip are the newest iPad Pro models . The most affordable option is the 11-inch iPad Pro with 256GB of storage which was launched at Rs 99,900.Gurman claims that both the MacBook Pro and MacBook Air won't see any design changes despite getting upgraded to the M4 chipsets. This comes after the 2021 redesign of the MacBook Pro with the M1 chip.He also suggested that a more significant visual overhaul might be coming in 2026, potentially coinciding with the adoption of OLED displays similar to the latest iPad Pro models.Similarly, the MacBook Air is also expected to wait until 2027 for a design refresh, five years after it departs from the wedge shape.Gurman acknowledges that a chip upgrade alone might not be enough to entice existing MacBook users to upgrade.To address this, Apple is reportedly considering a monthly subscription service that builds upon the free Apple Intelligence launching this fall.Additionally, Gurman claims Apple might integrate and potentially take a commission on third-party AI services like ChatGPT, mirroring their App Store model.
Article Summary: Apple is expected to launch new MacBook Pro and MacBook Air models in the coming months. The rumoured machines are likely to come powered by three variants of Apple‚Äôs M4 chipsets. The upgraded MacBooks may retain their predecessor's designs and may even offer new features through an AI subscription service.

Article Title: Credit card cyber fraud: Essential steps to safeguard your finance
Article Text:
Best tips to protect from credit card cyber fraud

Monitor account activity: Regularly review your credit card statements and transaction history for any unauthorised charges or suspicious activity.

Enable alerts: Set up transaction alerts through your bank or credit card issuer to receive notifications of any transactions made with your card.

Use strong and unique passwords: Secure your online banking and shopping accounts with strong passwords that include a combination of letters, numbers, and special characters. Avoid using information that is easily guessed, such as birth dates and names.

Enable 2-factor authentication: Utilise two-factor authentication (2FA) wherever possible to add an extra layer of security to your online accounts.

Be cautious of phishing scams: Avoid clicking on links or downloading attachments from unsolicited emails, messages, or websites that ask for your credit card information.

Shop only on secure websites: Ensure that the websites you use for online shopping are secure. To ensure secure browsing, ensure that the URL contains HTTPS and a padlock symbol in the address bar.

Use virtual credit card numbers: Some banks offer virtual credit card numbers for online transactions. These are temporary numbers that cannot be linked to your actual credit card account.

Keep your devices secure: Install antivirus software, keep your operating system and apps updated, and avoid connecting to unsecured public Wi-Fi networks when making online transactions.

Shred personal documents: Shred any documents containing sensitive information such as credit card statements or receipts before disposing of them.

Report lost or stolen cards immediately: Contact your bank or credit card issuer immediately if your card is lost or stolen to prevent unauthorised use.

Also read

Credit card fraud involves cybercriminals obtaining sensitive credit card information such as the card number, PIN, CVV, and other necessary details to make unauthorised purchases or transfers.While credit card fraud detection systems can aid in identifying fraudulent transactions to some extent, fraudsters often manage to inflict substantial financial harm on victims before being apprehended.Therefore, it's crucial to familiarise oneself with various types of credit card fraud and take proactive measures to avoid becoming a victim. Being vigilant and informed can significantly reduce the risk of falling prey to such fraudulent activities.Despite the low or zero liabilities for credit card users, fraud or identity theft can still cause significant inconvenience for both customers and banks. While the bank's zero-liability policy protects credit card users from financial losses if they report the fraud within 60 days, they must endure the process of detecting the theft, notifying the bank, obtaining a replacement card, paying any associated fees, and updating all automatic payment accounts.The rise of awareness among credit card users is essential for early detection and prevention of fraud, helping banks address potential issues proactively.
Article Summary: The rise of awareness among credit card users is essential for early detection and prevention of fraud. Fraud or identity theft can still cause significant inconvenience for both customers and banks. Being vigilant and informed can significantly reduce the risk of falling prey to such fraudulent activities.

Article Title: iQoo Z9 Lite 5G smartphone to launch in India on July 15: Here‚Äôs what the smartphone may offer
Article Text:
iQoo Z9 Lite confirmed details

iQoo Z9 Lite expected specs and price

iQoo is all set to launch its new Z-series smartphone in India. The Chinese smartphone maker iQoo has confirmed that it will launch the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone in the country on July 15.The company posted on X (formerly known as Twitter) about the upcoming iQoo launch. ‚ÄúTaking it slow? - no more! A #FullyLoaded5G experience awaits you! #iQOOZ9Lite,‚Äù reads the post.Along with the launch date, iQoo has also shared a teaser image of the upcoming iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone.The company has confirmed that the yet-to-launch iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone will sport a dual rear camera setup. The smartphone will feature a flat rear panel and display. The dual rear camera is placed inside a rectangular module located at the top left corner.The smartphone maker has also confirmed that the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone will pack an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset paired with 6GB of RAM. The smartphone will offer 128GB internal storage.iQoo Z9 Lite is said to sport a 6.56-inch HD+ LCD display which is expected to offer up to 90Hz of refresh rate. The smartphone is tipped to sport a 50MP main camera and a 2MP depth sensor.The smartphone is also rumoured to come equipped with a side-mounted fingerprint sensor and house a 5000 mAh battery with 15W fast charging support.Multiple online rumours suggest that the iQoo Z9 Lite may come with a starting price tag of Rs 10,000.
Article Summary: iQoo is all set to launch its new Z-series smartphone in India. The Chinese smartphone maker has confirmed that it will launch the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone in the country on July 15. The smartphone is tipped to sport a 50MP main camera and a 2MP depth sensor. It is also rumoured to come equipped with a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.

Article Title: Virat Kohli's this 'Jai Hind post' becomes the 'most-liked' ever on Instagram
Article Text:
Virat Kohli‚Äôs Instagram post

Virat Kohli announced retirement from T20 playing format

Virat Kohli has smashed another record, this time off the field. His celebratory Instagram post following India's T20 World Cup victory has become the most-liked photo ever posted on an Indian account.The emotional post, featuring a collage of Team India celebrating their win, garnered over 19 million likes and counting at the time of writing.Kohli's caption, simply stating "Couldn't have dreamt of a better day than this. God is great and I bow my head in gratitude. We finally did it üáÆüá≥‚ù§Ô∏èüáÆüá≥‚ù§Ô∏èjai hind ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è," resonated deeply with fans across the nation.The previous record for the most-liked Instagram post in India was held by Bollywood couple Kiara Advani and Sidharth Malhotra 's wedding announcement. However, Virat Kohli's post surpassed that record with a significant margin.The comments section of his post was flooded with congratulatory messages from celebrities, athletes, and fans alike. Even international sports stars joined the celebration, with comments from MMA fighter Conor McGregor and Brazilian footballer Vinicius Jr. showering Kohli with praise.Virat Kohli announced his retirement from the T20 International format after leading his team to a thrilling victory in the 2024 T20 World Cup final. "This was my last T20 game playing for India," Kohli declared. "This World Cup was the perfect culmination for this chapter in my career. Time for the next generation to take the T20 game forward."
Article Summary: Virat Kohli has smashed another record, this time off the field. His celebratory Instagram post following India's T20 World Cup victory has become the most-liked photo ever posted on an Indian account. The emotional post, featuring a collage of Team India celebrating their win, garnered over 19 million likes.

Mukesh Ambani-owned Reliance Jio has announced a price increase for all its prepaid and postpaid plans, effective from today, July 3. The new tariff prices will be implemented across all touchpoints and channels. The most affordable plan, now priced at Rs 189, was previously Rs 155, marking a 22% rise. It's important to note that despite the price hike, the plan benefits such as call minutes and data allowance will remain unchanged.The telecom service provider has announced the price hike for 14 prepaid unlimited plans, 3 data add-on plans and 2 postpaid plans.Here‚Äôs a list of all the plans:The new tariff plans feature various price adjustments for popular monthly, bi-monthly, quarterly, annual, data add-on, and postpaid options. Monthly plans now range from Rs 189 to Rs 449 (increased from Rs 155 to Rs 399). Bi-monthly plans are priced between Rs 579 and Rs 629 for data ranging from 1.5GB/day to 2GB/day over 56 days. Quarterly plans are available from Rs 479 to Rs 1199, offering 6GB to 3GB/day over 84 days. Annual plans range from Rs 1899 to Rs 3599.Note that once the price hike goes into effect, the unlimited 5G data will only be available with plans offering 2GB/day data or above.
Article Summary: Reliance Jio announces price hike for 14 prepaid unlimited plans, 3 data add-on plans and 2 postpaid plans. Monthly plans now range from Rs 189 to Rs 449, with data offerings. Quarterly and annual plans also see adjustments. Telecom service provider ensures unchanged benefits amidst the price hike.

Steps to use Indian Bike Driving 3D Cheat Codes

Begin by starting the Indian Bike Driving 3D game on your device.

Look for the button featuring a phone icon, typically located at the bottom left corner of the game screen. Click on this icon to open the phone menu.

Within the phone menu, find the handset icon, usually coloured green and positioned in the middle. Click on this icon to proceed.

Upon clicking the handset icon, a contact list will appear on the screen. Look for an icon featuring nine orange circles at the bottom left corner of this screen. Click on it to access the number entry interface.

In the number entry interface, use your device's keypad to input one of the provided cheat codes. Each cheat code corresponds to a specific reward mentioned in the description.

Bharti Airtel has announced a price hike across all its prepaid and postpaid plans. Airtel's revised tariff plans will be effective from today, July 3. As announced by the company, it has increased the price of its entry-level plans by 70 paise, 'in order to eliminate any burden on budget challenged consumers.'It must be noted here that while the plans have become costlier, benefits like data, call minutes, etc remain the same.In total, Airtel has increased the price of 15 prepaid and postpaid plans. These prices apply to all circles, including Bharti Hexacom Ltd. Circles. Reliance Jio and Vodafone Idea have also increased their tariff rates by up to 22%.The revised tariff increases the price of Rs 179 monthly plan to Rs 199. The plan will continue to offer 2GB mobile data per day, unlimited calling and 100 SMS per day. Validity of the plan remains 28 days. Similarly, the annual plan of Rs 1,799 offering 2GB mobile data per day, unlimited calling and 100 SMSes every day will now cost Rs 1,999.Airtel's daily data add-on plans now come at Rs 22 onwards (a hike of Rs 3 from the previous Rs 19).Coming to Airtel's postpaid plans, the price now ranges from Rs 449 to Rs 1,199. Daily data plans offering up to 3GB data per day now come with starting price of Rs 265.
Article Summary: Bharti Airtel has increased the price of its monthly plan to Rs 199, offering 2GB data daily, unlimited calling, and 100 SMS per day. The annual plan now costs Rs 1,999 with the same benefits. These changes aim to support budget- constrained consumers while maintaining service quality.

Article Title: Why Anand Mahindra ‚Äòcalled‚Äô ChatGPT after India‚Äôs Cricket World Cup win
Article Text:
Why Anand Mahindra ‚Äòcalled‚Äô ChatGPT

‚ÄúHello Chat GPT 4.O

Please make me a graphic image showing the Indian Cricket team as Superheroes.

Because they were SuperCool till the end.

The greatest gift of this final to India was that it didn‚Äôt come easy. It almost slipped out of their grasp. But they never lost the match in their minds.

Reminding all of us that being a Superhero never comes without a fierce determination to win and a Never Give In attitude.

Jai Ho! #IndiavsSA #T20WorldCupFinal‚Äù reads the post.

Here how users reacted to the post

Team India becomes T20 World Cup 2024 champions

Mahindra Group chairman Anand Mahindra is known for his active social media presence and witty remarks. Following India's dominating victory against South Africa in the T20 World Cup final, Mahindra posted a congratulatory message on X (formerly known as Twitter) with the help of ChatGPT .Mahindra asked ChatGPT 4.0 to create an AI-generated image of the Indian Cricket Team, requesting that the cricketers be depicted as superheroes.Mahindra also shared the ChatGPT-generated image on X. In the image, Team India is depicted as superheroes wearing capes featuring the Indian national flag.Men in Blue secured a thrilling victory in the T20 World Cup 2024 final. After a tense battle against South Africa at the iconic Kensington Oval, India emerged champions with a narrow seven-run win. Virat Kohli's dominant 76 and Rohit Sharma 's sharp captaincy were instrumental in securing the win. Following the game, Virat Kohli also announced his retirement from the T20 format.
Article Summary: Anand Mahindra asked ChatGPT 4.0 to create an AI-generated image of the Indian Cricket Team. In the image, Team India is depicted as superheroes wearing capes featuring the Indian national flag. Men in Blue secured a thrilling victory in the T20 World Cup 2024 final.

Article Title: Shark Tank Judge Anupam Mittal on India semi-final win: Chalo 'yeh bhi' hisaab barabar
Article Text:
Here's what Anupam Mittal wrote on X

How other brands celebrated India's win

India reached the finals of ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 with a thumping victory over England by 68 runs. After losing the toss against England, India scored 171/7 in 20 overs at the Guyana National Stadium. The men in blue all out England in just 16.4 overs, limiting them to 103 runs. India will now play the finals against South Africa on June 29 at Barbados.Like other matches, India's victory over England is being celebrated across the country.Shark Tank judge Anupam Mittal shared his joy over India's win via a post on microblogging platform - X, formerly Twitter.In his post, Mittal wrote "1947 me India se nikala aur 2024 me West Indies se,". Adding further, he said "Chalo üá¨üáß2022 ka bhi hisaab barabar üáÆüá≥üèÜ," pointing at 2022 India's loss against England in the 2022 T20 World Cup semi-final ."don't know about english tea, but english tears are delicious üòÇ #INDvENG," food delivery app Zomato wrote in a X post."Just packing ; Revenge order for Semi-Final in 2022 üò§," Walmart-owned Flipkart wrote. ‚ÄúHitman has once again added hope to the cart üôè," the e-commerce company wrote in another post on X.Quick commerce app Blinkit shared an image of billboard that read "Dear England, if you are thirsty, we can deliver a bo'ah of wo'ah in 10 minutes."
Article Summary: India reached the finals of ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 with a thumping victory over England by 68 runs. The men in blue all out England in just 16.4 overs, limiting them to 103 runs. India will now play the finals against South Africa on June 29 at Barbados.

Article Title: Microsoft Xbox server outage fixed, here‚Äôs what the company said
Article Text:
What caused the Xbox outage?

Microsoft has fixed the Xbox Live service outage that impacted users worldwide who were unable to sign into their Xbox accounts. According to the official support page of Xbox, the service is now up and running.The outage, according to Downdetector, started late night on July 2 around 11pm IST and lasted for several hours till morning next day.Xbox started an investigation which lasted for hours.However, the company did not reveal the exact reason of what resulted in the outage, but kept continuously updating users about it.After the service was restored, official handle of Xbox Support on X (formerly Twitter) said ‚ÄúUsers should no longer be encountering issues signing in to Xbox Live and services. Thank you for your patience, game on!‚Äù.As per Downdetector, thousands of Xbox Live users were affected by the outage. The company said that it was ‚Äúaware that some users have been disconnected from Xbox Live. We're investigating! Please follow here and on our status page for updates. http://Xbox.com/status‚Äù.While the status page read ‚ÄúYou may not be able to sign-in to your Xbox profile, may be disconnected while signed in, or have other related problems,‚Äù the notice read. ‚ÄúFeatures that require sign-in like most games, apps and social activity won‚Äôt be available.‚Äù
Article Summary: Microsoft has fixed the Xbox Live service outage that impacted users worldwide. According to the official support page of Xbox, the service is now up and running. The outage, according to Downdetector, started late night on July 2 around 11pm IST.

Article Title: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max may offer longer battery life
Article Text:
Apple to use steel battery case to tackle overheating

Apple iPhone 16 series rumours

Apple iPhone 16 series is expected to launch in September and in the run up to the debut, the rumour mill is already churning out scores of leaks. According to another such leak, iPhone 16 Pro Max is expected to get a boost in battery life .Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo has said that the Cupertino-based giant is increasing the energy density of the battery cells of iPhone 16 Pro Max, which will result in longer battery life.‚ÄúMy latest supply chain survey indicates the energy density (Wh/kg) of the battery cells of iPhone 16 Pro Max will increase, which has the benefit of longer battery life with the same battery size or lower battery size with the same battery life,‚Äù he said in a post.However, with increase in energy density of the battery cells, there will be an increase in temperature when running. To tackle this, Apple will use the stainless steel battery case .‚ÄúIncreasing the energy density of the battery cells will increase the battery temperature when running. To avoid overheating the battery, Apple uses the stainless steel battery case for the first time as a thermal solution ,‚Äù Kuo said.While stainless steel may not be as effective as aluminium in dissipating heat, ‚Äúit is more robust and less susceptible to corrosion, so in addition to dissipating heat, the stainless steel battery case provides better protection for the battery and the iPhone system.‚ÄùKuo noted that the use of a stainless steel battery case will reduce the difficulty of removing the battery, hence, helping Apple to ‚Äúcomply with the European Union‚Äôs requirements for mobile phone batteries‚Äô replaceability in the future.‚Äù‚ÄúIf the mass production of this new battery design (upgraded energy density of battery cells & adoption of the stainless steel battery case) goes well and the feedback is favourable, this new battery design will be adopted in all 2H25 new iPhone models,‚Äù Kuo noted.The iPhone 16 series is rumoured to replace physical buttons with touch-sensitive buttons that simulate a press with haptic feedback. The camera layout might shift to a vertical design, unlike the current diagonal setup. The customisable Action button, currently on Pro models, might be available on all iPhone 16 models.Under the hood, the standard iPhone 16 and Plus models might use the A18 chip , while Pro models could get the A18 Pro chip. Meanwhile, the display size for iPhone 16 and Plus (6.1-inch and 6.7-inch) might remain the same, but the refresh rate could improve.
Article Summary: iPhone 16 Pro Max is expected to get a boost in battery life. Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said that the Cupertino-based giant is increasing the energy density of the battery cells. With increase in energy density, there will be an increase in temperature when running. To tackle this, Apple will use the stainless steel battery case.
